Swedish Oatmeal Cookies
Cookies
60g butter
100g porridge oats
120g granulated light brown sugar
1 egg
15g flour
1tsp baking powder
1g salt
  1. Melt the butter and mix in the porridge oats, followed by the flour, baking powder and salt
  2. Whisk the egg and sugar together until pale and thick
  3. Fold the oats into the egg and sugar
  4. Line baking sheets with parchment, and spoon out the mix. You should only have 6 per large baking sheet as they spread a lot
  5. Bake at 170C until the edges are going a medium brown. About 6-8 minutes
  6. Remove from the oven, slide the baking paper off the pan, and leave to cool
Notes
  • Best cooked reasonably near the bottom. This allows the bottom of the cookies to crisp up and release from the paper, while leaving the top a bit chewy
Footer. Not much here really. Nice to have a footer though.
